scripts.lint: pylint vsm && pylint -d duplicate-code vsm test/*.py && autopep8 -aad --exit-code $(git ls-files '*.py')
scripts.pretest: npm run teardown && npm run setup -- integration
scripts.posttest: npm run teardown && genbadge coverage -i coverage.xml && genbadge tests -i tests.xml
scripts.pree2e: npm run build && npm run teardown && npm run setup -- e2e
